news_sources.title: Data Sources to Aggregate
news_sources.description: List of Apify actor sources with category and type mappings.

actorId.title: Actor ID
actorId.description: The Apify actor ID (e.g., username/actor-name) producing the dataset.

categoryName.title: Category Name
categoryName.description: Friendly label grouping this data source (e.g., World News).

sourceType.title: Source Type
sourceType.description: The category of the source (e.g., professional news, blog, social media).

max_articles.title: Max Articles per Source
max_articles.description: Maximum number of articles to fetch per data source. Default is 20.

max_clusters_per_category.title: Maximum Clusters per Category
max_clusters_per_category.description: Limit how many trend clusters the LLM extracts per category (default: 5).
